text: @realDonaldTrump What’s your real problem?  Was your birthday cake the wrong flavor.  And yes, people are concerned about the surge of Coronavirus in some of our states, as well they should be.  How many thousands of lost individuals is enough for you?  You’re always angry if you have to lead.
